overview: Brian Ferdinand is the founder and President of Liquid Holdings Group, LLC. Mr. Ferdinand began his proprietary trading career as Partner and Managing Director of ECHOtrade, LLC a U.S. based broker dealer. Mr. Ferdinand grew ECHO from a single person to over 400 traders directly under his management with offices in New York, Boston, Philadelphia, Boca Raton, Miami, New Jersey and Chicago. He architected ECHO’s direct market access on the New York Stock Exchange, becoming the first client of Merrill Lynch to do so. Mr. Ferdinand is an industry-acknowledged leader in developing and creating automated trading strategies, and while at ECHO created models that generated in excess of $100 million in trading profit. In early 2009 Mr. Ferdinand recognized the shift away from HFT and began building the framework that became Liquid Holdings Group. Mr. Ferdinand got his start in financial services over a decade ago as the portfolio manager of Sharp Capital, LP.
